note.p: Brewer, maltster and farmer. Of Grinstead Green, Farnborough, Kent. Son of John Fox (1786/7–1861), brewer, of Farnborough, and brother of Thomas Samuel Fox and William Beardsworth Fox.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/464/204/5)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 1 February 2018)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1859.
